title: all campions not in store-?
body: so there are over 100 champs in lol but when you go to the store it feels like half are missing. i look in the store after every game and it seems the camps you see in matches will be added to the store. i never saw shen then i played against one and there you go shen was in my store. is there something to the store i dont know about.

replies.body: Are you sure you're looking at the Store and not Collections?  Toss me a screenshot of what you're seeing so I can get a better idea of the situation.  Looking forward to helping out!
